name: autocomplete-sa
author: Sasnskrit coders <sanskrit-programmers@googlegroups.com>
description: Sanskrit word autocompetion with the hint of explanation.

FileType.description: List of scopes for typing which will be given the word completion. See [the README](https://github.com/sanskrit-coders/autocomplete-sa/blob/master/README.md) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.

dictCategories.description: Dictionary categories to enable. Options: declined,kaavya,veda,stem
